extendedInfo.description: Spice up your sex life with these erotic dice.This app has the most realistic sounding, physics-based dice simulator on the market.Whether at home or on the run,with these dice you're sure to have fun.If you are shy and want to be sly,then play the game on mild.If you are freaky and want to get kinky,then play the game on wild.Swipe the screen to roll the dice,some rolls will be naughty, some will be nice.Some of the combos may be silly or funny,so get naked and grab your hunny.Play the game and explore each other's body,this game is fun and a little naughty!

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t see the dice but could hear them roll
reviews.author: Kerry Meek
